basics.name: Shashi B. Mishra
basics.summary: Currently Postdoctoral researcher at Department of Physics, SUNY Binghamton. My research interests include Computational Physics, Machine Learning, and High Performance Computing. I completed my Ph.D. in Physics from IIT Madras, India in 2020.

work.summary: Phonon-mediated superconductivity, tranport properties of topological materials, and EPW code development
First principle study of light-induced magnetic phenomena in metals for magnetic switching devices
Development of TiO2 based materials for gas sensing and solar cell applications

publications.name: Virtual synthesis of crystals using ab initio MD: Case study on LiFePO4
publications.summary: Ab initio molecular dynamics approach for virtual synthesis of crystal structures.

publications.name: Quantum well Structure of Double Perovskite Superlattice and Formation of Spin-polarized Two-dimensional Electron gas
publications.summary: Discovery of quantum well states and spin-polarized 2D electron gas formation in double perovskite superlattices.

publications.name: Quantum-Mechanical Process of Carbonate Complex Formation and Large-scale Anisotropy in the Adsorption Energy of CO2 on Anatase TiO2(001) Surface
publications.summary: Detailed quantum mechanical analysis of CO2 carbonate complex formation on TiO2 surfaces.

publications.name: Facet Dependent Catalytic Activities of Anatase TiO2 for CO2 Adsorption and Conversion
publications.summary: Systematic first-principles study of CO2 interaction with different anatase TiO2 facets.

publications.name: Mechanistic Understanding of NO2 Dissociation on a Rutile TiO2(110) Surface
publications.summary: Electronic structure study of NO2 dissociation mechanisms on rutile TiO2 surfaces.

publications.name: Fluorine Intercalated Graphene: Formation of a Two-dimensional Spin Lattice through Pseudoatomization
publications.summary: Discovery of novel magnetic ordering in fluorine-intercalated graphene.

publications.name: Density Functional Theory Studies of Si2BN Nanosheets as Anode Materials for Magnesium Ion Batteries
publications.summary: First-principles study of Si2BN nanosheets for magnesium ion battery applications.

publications.name: Development of Short and Long-range Magnetic order in Ba2MnTeO6
publications.summary: Study of magnetic ordering in double perovskite frustrated antiferromagnet.

publications.name: Electronic Structure of Graphene/TiO2 Interface: Design and Functional Perspectives
publications.summary: First-principles analysis of graphene/anatase TiO2 heterostructure interfaces.

publications.name: Graphdiyne-A promising Cathode Material for Aluminium dual ion Battery
publications.summary: First-principles design of graphdiyne as cathode material for aluminum ion batteries.

publications.name: Adsorption and Degradation Mechanism of 2,4,6-TNT on TiO2 (110) surface
publications.summary: First-principles study of TNT adsorption and degradation mechanisms on TiO2 surfaces.

publications.name: High energy ion induced modification in TiO2 nanorods
publications.summary: Study of high energy ion beam effects on TiO2 nanorods structure and properties.

publications.name: Work Function of van der Waals Topological Semimetals: Experiment and Theory
publications.summary: Combined experimental and theoretical study of work functions in topological semimetals.

publications.name: Design of Aluminium ion battery with Graphyne host
publications.summary: First-principles design of graphyne as anode material for aluminum-ion batteries.

publications.name: Spin contribution to the inverse Faraday effect of nonmagnetic metals
publications.summary: Theoretical investigation of spin contributions to inverse Faraday effect in nonmagnetic metals.

publications.name: Specular inverse Faraday effect in transition metals
publications.summary: Experimental measurements of inverse Faraday effect using transient ellipsometry.

publications.name: Si2BN nanosheets as anchoring cathode material for Al-ion battery
publications.summary: First-principles design of Si2BN nanosheets as cathode material for aluminum-ion batteries.

publications.name: Hydrothermally Grown Halogen-Doped ZnO Nanorods for Photoelectrochemical Water Oxidation
publications.summary: Combined experimental and DFT study of halogen-doped ZnO nanorods for water oxidation.

publications.name: Stability-superconductivity map for compressed Na-intercalated graphite
publications.summary: Comprehensive phase diagram of superconductivity in compressed sodium-intercalated graphite.

publications.name: Electron-phonon vertex correction effect in superconducting H3S
publications.summary: First implementation of vertex corrections beyond Migdal approximation for superconducting hydrides.

publications.name: Inverse Faraday effect in 3d, 4d, and 5d transition metals
publications.summary: Comprehensive first-principles study of inverse Faraday effect across transition metal series.

publications.name: Electrostatic Self-assembly Driven Heterojunction of CeO2/g-C3N4 Nanosheets
publications.summary: Hybrid experimental and theoretical study of CeO2/g-C3N4 heterojunction for photocatalysis.

publications.name: Cubic BeB2: A metastable p-type conductive material from first principles
publications.summary: First-principles study of cubic BeB2 as a metastable p-type conductive material.

publications.name: Defects Dynamics in Photo-Excited CeO2 and their Influence on CO2 Photoreduction
publications.summary: Study of defect dynamics in photo-excited CeO2 and their role in CO2 photoreduction.

publications.name: Nonadiabatic and anharmonic effects in high-pressure H3S and D3S superconductors
publications.summary: Investigation of nonadiabatic and anharmonic effects in high-temperature superconducting hydrides.

publications.name: Phonon-limited carrier transport in the Weyl semimetal TaAs
publications.summary: First-principles study of phonon-limited carrier transport in the Weyl semimetal TaAs.

publications.name: Comparative study of phonon-limited carrier transport in the Weyl semimetal TaAs family
publications.summary: Comparative study of carrier transport in the TaAs Weyl semimetal family.

presentations.name: First-order vertex corrections to phonon-mediated superconductivity in H3S and Pb
Stability-superconductivity map for compressed Na-intercalated graphite
First-principles study of phonon-mediated superconductivity beyond the Migdal approximation
Inverse Faraday effect for transition metals
Theory of inverse Faraday effect for non-magnetic materials

teaching.description: Designed, prepared, and taught Electronics laboratory exercises to 60 Engineering Physics students
Prepared and taught Advanced Physics laboratory exercises to 50 Engineering Physics students
TA at the School on Electron-Phonon Physics, Many-Body Perturbation Theory, and Computational Workflows
TA for hands-on exercises on Quantum ESPRESSO at EESTER 2018
